SENT.plain: Thirty-two patients with LAF were studied
They were followed up for 2 to 16 years
On admission, most patients (94 percent) were symptomatic and had palpitations, nine had nonspecific chest pain, and five had syncope or near syncope
Left atrial size measured by echocardiography was less than 40 mm in all patients
During the follow-up period, only one patient had a complication, ie, cerebral embolism
We conclude that LAF may be regarded as a relatively benign form of AF
According to our study, one of its features is left atrial size not larger than 40 mm in echocardiography
